LanguageData.SelectImplanterPresetDesc: Select auto implanter preset from the list
LanguageData.AutoImplanterProcessStarted: Can't switch preset when the auto implanter is started
LanguageData.AutoImplanterStartDesc: Once the {0} is filled with the required ingredients, {1}, select a colonist and right-click on the {0} or on a downed person to start the scanner.
LanguageData.CommandCancelAutoImplanterDesc: Cancel the implanter process. The contained person will be ejected.
LanguageData.ConfirmCancelAutoImplanter: Cancelling the process will kill {PAWN_nameDef}. Are you sure you want to continue?
